mapper.select: SELECT h.id, h.title, h.content, h.inserted, h.updated, u.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount FROM tb_board_help h JOIN tb_user u ON h.memberId = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_reply_help r ON h.id = r.boardId WHERE content like concat('%',#{search},'%' ) GROUP BY h.id ORDER BY h.id DESC
SELECT p.id, p.memberId, p.location, p.up, p.views, p.tag, p.title, p.content, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickname FROM tb_board_help p JOIN tb_user m ON m.id = p.memberId Order By p.id DESC
SELECT p.id, p.memberId, p.location, p.up, p.views, p.tag, p.title, p.content, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickname FROM tb_board_help p JOIN tb_user m ON m.id = p.memberId WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board_help (memberId, location, tag, title, content) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{location}, #{tag}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_board_help SET location = #{location}, tag = #{tag}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
